website_summaries.verdict: A durable casserole dish for a wide range of dishes – and beautiful enough to use as a serving dish.
pros: Porcelain – no need to season and easy to clean
Tight sealing lid for optimal results and keeps leftovers fresh
cons: Some reports of chips or cracks upon arrival or only a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Chipped after only 3 months left it unusable
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pan when it first arrived, so much so that it's home was on my stovetop as it was the main pan I used daily. It was easy to clean and I really liked the kind of cook I got on my food. BUT, I was very disappointed when the enamel started peeling off only 3 months after purchase. I always hand washed and never used metal utensils, it just started peeling while I was cooking. Would like to return but it's out of the return time. Wasted my money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joani

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Defective, Enamel chipped off pan, leaving exposed cast iron. Unattractive and defective.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Enameled Cast Iron Covered pan today, but I'm returning it. The blue enamel was completely chipped off one side of the pan, the enamel chips in chunks and small pieces in the packaging. The packaging itself was intact, so it wasn't a clear case of packaging mishap in spite of the coating on the pan falling off.. I am not re-ordering. I read other bad reviews about the coating on this pan before I ordered, but ignored them because I have another Lodge pan (dutch oven) that is great. I may go for one of the more expensive brands instead Lodge for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kat K

customer_reviews.title: Lodge Enameled Cast Iron Covered Casserole Does not Disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: OK, I got this casserole instead of the LC. I have wanted LC for quite some time, but they were cost prohibitive. So after much research, I decided to try the Lodge Enameled Cast Iron Covered Casserole. I prepared some chicken in the casserole, and I immediately noticed the chicken's appearance was delicious. The chicken was cooked thoroughly, and it was so tender and juicy! The clean up was a cinch as well. I am very pleased and would recommend this to anyone! It is nice to have such a high quality product at an affordable, fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna L. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Chip after one use
customer_reviews.text: I received these cast iron casserole dishes 2 days before Thanksgiving. I used them both in the oven with temperature at 350 degrees. Both dishes had enamel chip off the handle and opening. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook and know the value of owning a couple of cast iron pans. I have a good ole' old-fashion pan and dutch oven. However, I grew tired of having to clean them after each use along with all the other stuff I have to do to them on occasion (seasoning). So I thought I'd invest in an enameled cast iron dish and I LOVE IT! It is easier to clean and (shhh! Don't tell anyone) but I even opted out of cleaning it after using it to cook dinner one time. The next day I cleaned it and it looked as good as new...no rust...no re-seasoning...no nothing! It's my new go to pan.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan, but not super durable
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this pan about a year ago and have loved it. It's a great size for one-dish meals and performs, as far as I can tell, as well as any of my more expensive enameled cast iron cookware. However, it's not super durable. I moved cross-country a few months ago and it developed big chips in the enamel despite careful packing (padded it, wrapped it tightly, and kept it in my car with me rather than shipping it). My larger enameled cast iron pot (different brand) was packed the same way and was fine. I'm still giving it 4 stars as here I am buying another one because I liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: James Russell

customer_reviews.title: No refunds given under any circumstance
customer_reviews.text: You can't return this item, even if you didn't open the box and didn't use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this pot for my new kitchen. It came today— broken!! Enamel chipped inside and outside.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Don't order if you want it to be a surprise
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered for my wife for a Christmas present. It was shipped in it's original box that says exactly what is on the inside and of course she was the one who answered the door when it was delivered. Even Alexa says she won't announce messages until after the holiday so as to not spoil surprises. (I on't know why that's restricted to holidays, but at least they do that) May not be fair to blame the manufacturer, but this is the only place for a review.
customer_reviews.author: jeffreypaulh

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. Couldn't have ask for anything better. Great price. A pleasure to use. Easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA BAILEY

customer_reviews.title: My favorite piece of cookware--absolutely.
customer_reviews.text: SUCH a great casserole; a joy to cook with, is virtually non-stick, browns beautifully, and is very durable. I used it regularly for more than a year, and it still looks brand-new. We do hand-wash, because it's just so easy, and I want it to last forever. It IS extremely heavy (which I knew beforehand) but is my favorite pan; large and roomy to make a meal now and freeze the rest for later.
customer_reviews.author: BGBacaSF

customer_reviews.title: Rivals Le Creuset at a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this and my two other pieces of Lodge enameled cast iron cookware. I have one Le Creuset pot and hoped to add pieces as money permitted, but I was able to buy three pieces of Lodge cookware for less than my single Le Creuset cost. Cast iron is fantastic for baking, roasting, sautéing and simmering, and the enameled coating makes cleanup a breeze. I’ve been able to toss my nonstick skillets (about which I had health concerns) and cook only with my much safer cast iron pieces. With the right care, I expect my children will inherit these pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend(
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a frying pan of this type, because it is environmentally friendly, safe and still has a non-stick coating. But I was very upset with this item. The first came with an injury. I made an exchange and the second time came with a new one with a defect (added photo). I decided to leave this one. After a couple of applications to the pan, everything started to stick, although I warmed it up before that. I do not recommend this one. Better to buy Le Creuset and you will be happy for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Stvolrz

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to last but purchased April 2017 it’s October 2019 and the chips of enamel off the bottom of both my lodge cast iron items has gotten much worse. I’ll b spending the much higher price to get Emile Henry or equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: MMK2020

customer_reviews.title: Not true white
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful Pan. I am just disappointed that it is not a true white. It's an "off, off white. This was not made clear to me by the description on Amazon but when I received it, the package is labeled as Oyster white. Not sure yet if I will keep it. Well I Decided I am keeping the Pan. It is grey-ish white so it looks perfect in my Grey and white kitchen. Plus, I just used it and it's wonderful! Changed from 4 to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST SKILLET EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these for a long time, have seen some out at local retailers, way over priced. This one is a GREAT buy! Price is excellent, quality is excellent, delivered perfectly packed and on time, arrived in tip top shape. I've used it so many times already. Great for everything from frying a over easy egg, pancakes, making sautéed chicken cutlets, making a roux or lemon butter sauce reduction, all in all it's a great all around skillet and best part?? You can stick it in the oven too! Comes with a great lid also!! Definitely recommend this skillet, wish I would have bought it sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda R. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the color...it is more of a light gray rather than a creamy white as shown in the picture advertisement. I had ordered this "particular color" to go with our 6 quart creamy white Dutch oven so it was disappointing. Other than that, it's a nice saute cast iron product and will serve my purpose. It's also made in China which is another disappointment in Lodge...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything and everyday pan should be.....
customer_reviews.text: I love cast iron cookware. This braiser is deep enough to cook a pot roast but not so deep that you couldn't use it for many other cooking tasks....bacon and eggs, for example. It cleans easily without the worries of rust. I use my pan nearly everyday. This pan is a kitchen must-have. If I could give it more stars I would. I've used mine for months now and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Babs_n_Sicily

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: It bakes, sautes, fries and so far washes up great if cleaned right after it cools. The weight is heavy but at 78 years old, I can lift it and consider this an exercise ( weight lifting. ) Worth the price; still less expensive than Staub and le creuset. It has better ratings than less expensive brands Prior experience with Lodge enameled cast iron has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy and disappointed with this pan
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy and disappointed with this pan. It cooks at a very high heat even at the lowest setting on your stove ,everything burns and sticks to the bottom . Impossible to clean without scratching it. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. We both LOVE it. No matter what gets baked on, it cleans up easily. I have even used it over indirect heat on my grill. It got a dark haze on the outside from the smoke, but cleaned up easily. I have always loved cast iron. My wife doesn't like the fact tht it is so heavy, but she still loves cooking in this dish and the larger one that matches. Excellent heat distribution and retention. Quality is much better than some of the imported cast iron available.
customer_reviews.author: PFT

customer_reviews.title: Great one pan meals
customer_reviews.text: I brown the meat in olive oil on top of stove, preheat oven to 400F. Then add potatoes, carrots, onions, herbs. Put lid on and put in oven, roast about 30 mins, then lid off, turn on broiler about 10 mins. Check temp of chicken breast 165F degrees. I let pan cool down, put warm water, detergent, lid on, let sit for a while, then use sponge with green side. Easy clean up. The pan w lid is 13lbs, plus whatever food weighs, so not for people with low strength...
customer_reviews.author: Blabra

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I own several very pricey brand name cast iron pieces, and this Lodge braiser has so far, performed equally in cooking and ease of clean up. So glad I ordered this pan instead of the more costly one I looked at. It is very attractive and has large handles for ease of putting in and out of an oven or using on the stovetop. Nice large safe knob on top also.
customer_reviews.author: M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, practical but arrived with a small knick on handle from shipping & handling.
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the casserole. Cooks evenly and nicely. Received it in a package that was slightly smaller than the pot itself. Regrettably, the casserole was shipped in a box that was sightly smaller than the handles would allow. The result, we think is that one of the handles had a small knick from the transit. We did not return it as it did not impact functionality. This item was on preorder status for the longest time. It was worth the wait. These days that we are inside for most of the day, it stays on the stove as a beautiful, inviting and homey decor
customer_reviews.author: ALC

customer_reviews.title: Chipped up crap from china
customer_reviews.text: So angry said american its not its from china and its chipped up crap
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Lodge Come On!
customer_reviews.text: I love Lodge ceramic dutch ovens if the lid fits securely. This lid is questionable but it's such a hassle to return due to it's size and weight. No more ordering online will go to a store than sells lodge to make sure the lid fits securely- otherwise your out $$
customer_reviews.author: carla mannes

customer_reviews.title: In love with this casserole dish
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this type of dish for years. One of my old casserole dishes got lost in a move and I decided it was time to treat myself. So glad I did! Cooks like a dream, looks beautiful. Why spend the money for Le Creuset when this is just as great?
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Keep browsing for other brand
customer_reviews.text: Takes longer to heat than my other brand enamel cast. After actually heating up, overheats quickly and burns onto pan. Very difficult to clean when this happens and happens very often. Unfortunately was unable to return.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it so I purchased another one as a gift ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Lodge Color Enameled Cast Iron pan several months ago. I absolutely love it so I purchased another one as a gift for my sister-in-law. She had never known about anything cast iron. She told me she absolutely loves the pan and uses it for everything. She is a good cook, so I knew it would be a good gift for her. I originally ordered one from Chef's. It was on back order, however, it never arrived after a month waiting. So I went to Amazon and received it within 2 days. Thank you Amazon. You are my go to place from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Clean up is a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pan for about a month. I am still working on my braising skills. My first two attempts came out great. Today I made short ribs, same recipe I used before but I decided to add some chunked up carrots. I guess I should have added more liquid, because the carrots and onion were burned to the pan. My beautiful pan was a black mess! I soaked the pan for an hour and I couldn't believe how easily it cleaned up!!! My pan still looks beautiful!!! I love this pan and can't wait to purchase more Lodge cookware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J White

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t mind poorly glazed it cooks great
customer_reviews.text: Great pot but had discolorations on the lid that showed up after the first time I used it! I wash it by hand and have no idea other than maybe the glaze was not done well. Update: the absence of glaze is growing all over this pan. DO NOT BUY. I only hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Mom

customer_reviews.title: amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about lodge that hasn't been said. Great American company that makes a great product. Heat distribution is great. Food releases well. Cleanup is easy if you do it right when your done or warm it up before cleaning. From baking bread to biscuits to casserole to pan cooking stir fry and other meats. Its great because we cook extra and prep some lunches from the same meal. Red sauce didn't stain it and it still looks new. It is heavy and ya need some pot holders but thats expected. All in all I will continue to buy use and recommend lodge brand products
customer_reviews.author: John Hall

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I use this most often to create delicious stews, soups, crusty bread...you name it! Beautiful color, reliably sturdy, heavy duty, heat retaining, and inspirational! Cleans up so easily- only a few times I used some baking soda to rub off the stubborn brown spots so always looks new! Got one for my grown son who loves it as I do. I serve right out of the pot it looks so good!
customer_reviews.author: DAC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dish
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of cookware. It was packaged well and seems to be exactly what our daughter wanted. BE ADVISED - this is a very heavy dish even when it is empty. I know cast iron is heavy, but it still seemed like a lot of weight for it's size.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pot
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases this year. Big fan of cast iron pots. Would never spend hundreds of dollars on the famous brand but love Lodge & Martha Stewart. This Lodge model is a great size & perfect for many rice or stir fried dishes. The light gray color (looked more white in pictures) is fabulous. Selected a “damaged box” one & it arrived in perfect condition. Excellent price too!!
customer_reviews.author: MariaG

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter-in-law, who is a chef. She loves it, and has produced many a great meal with it. I'd call that a win-win-yum. The (smaller, lighter) casserole size is nice when you want the cast iron, but don't need the depth of the full-size Dutch oven. Can't beat Lodge for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph E.

customer_reviews.title: My New “Go To” Skillet
customer_reviews.text: Fantastically fabulous cast iron pan! This is my new go to pan. I appreciate that it functions like a cast iron skillet but is easier to manage both on the stove & in the oven. A second one had been purchased as well in a different color. Lodge products are well made to stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: OMG it’s love
customer_reviews.text: I just cooked a short rib in my new cast iron pretty blue braising pot and it’s such an improved difference to cook in this vs a stainless steel Dutch oven pot. The sauce didn’t cook down so fast and it thicken up to a wonderful gravy. The Dutch oven needed more attention to keep adding water to the hours of braising the meat. Plus it cleaned up so fast and easy too ! I love this pot.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: for sure it deserves the 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and felt it is a bit too big. Need to use a lot of oil but it is my own fault. It stains easily and have to use detergent to wash the color off. other than that it is fantastic. Deserve 5 stars for sure. If you have a small family do not buy it though.
customer_reviews.author: sally the real buyer

customer_reviews.title: We love this pan
customer_reviews.text: We love this pan. Since the day that we bought it, its the primary pan that's used! My husband couldn't believe how much I spent on it and wanted me to take it back. He hasn't touched another pan since. :) It is very heavy though so carry and transport with caution! Everything comes off very easily every things that would normally be very tough and hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: More than just for baking
customer_reviews.text: I can bake casseroles, or fry chicken in this pan. It's super versatile. I cannot put into words how much I adore this pan. I have been slowly building a collection of enameled cast iron. I recommend this pan. 100%
customer_reviews.author: MoonQuill

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on the 6 qt. dutch oven for months, and when I finally ordered it, I got this one too. Turns out I use this more than I ever will the bigger pan - it's more like a deep frying pan without the long handle. Very versatile, goes from stove top to oven, and clean up is a breeze. Great investment that I'm looking forward to enjoying for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D

customer_reviews.title: You can not return this product.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product! Mine arrived with pits in the ceramic and YOU CAN NOT RETURN this item. I’m left with a pot that ceramic will probably peeled after the first use. Poor quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. I’ve only had it for a couple of weeks but have used it at least 6 times...it’s the right size for so many recipes! Cleans up easy, great color. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lwg

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: We did research on cast iron options and settled on this one after reading lots of reviews. We’ve loved using this pan and have cooked a variety of meals with it so far. It is easy and quick to hand wash and the color looks awesome as an accessory in our kitchen. The pan came packed really well, no chips or scratches out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I have numerous Lodge items that has zero issues but this one WAS a disappointment...until now.
customer_reviews.text: 1st one had a chip in the cooking surface. 2nd one had a chip in the cooking surface. 3rd one had a chip in the cooking surface & the lid did not seal. I've given up on this product. I have numerous Lodge items that has zero issues but this one has been a disappointment. =========== 02/05/2018 Contacted Lodge about this ongoing issue. They took care of it with the quickness. Now it gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: constance

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it, so I gave it away. First, it's just way too heavy; yes, I know it's cast iron, but it seems unusually heavy. Second, everything I cooked in it stuck, no matter what I did. I will say, even though things stuck, it was easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: EastTexasHappy

customer_reviews.title: Size a bit misleading
customer_reviews.text: The size of the pan is misleading. The information stated the pan to be 15 inches by 13 inches. The inside of the pan is a circle that is 11.75 in diameter so I'm not sure how they determined the 13 inch measurement. The size from the outside of one handle to the opposite handle is almost 14.75 inches. I was hoping the pan was more of an oval 15x13. Nonetheless we will keep it and use it as we have other Lodge enameled cast iron vessels that we use often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Note that the enamel is not very non-stick, food needs constant de-glazing and agitation to prevent burning. Otherwise, a beautiful piece of cookware that’s easy to take care of.
customer_reviews.author: TX newbie

customer_reviews.title: Loving this Lodge Casserole Dish!
customer_reviews.text: I used this piece for the first time tonight and can honestly say it lives up to the hype! My hominy casserole (shown in the photo) cooked evenly and the flavor was fantastic! Yes, this cookware is understandably heavy, but it has a quality feel and is so very easy to clean! I really like the 3.6 quart size since I'm usually only cooking for two. Note to buyers: Follow the recommendations of care from Lodge, and you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Pinfeathers

customer_reviews.title: A Surprisingly Nice Way to Cook!
customer_reviews.text: I like to be able to go from stovetop to the oven. Many recipes call for it. It’s like a combination skillet and ovenware. Combine that with easy cleanup and what’s not to like. Much better than using a number of pots, pans, and Pyrexware, unless you really like cleanup! I prefer this way! For my Shepherds Pie, this holds 8 pounds of this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Book Glutton

customer_reviews.title: ... lot of the others and the quality is a good as it gets
customer_reviews.text: This was so much less money than a lot of the others and the quality is a good as it gets. The blue color is perfect - looks exactly like the photo. Been using it about a year now, and no scratches or chipping at all. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: PAT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my favorite oven baked German pancakes!
customer_reviews.text: No lie - this pan is HEAVY! And you have to use potholders to touch it LONG after it comes out of the oven, but that is why it is so perfect. Wonderful even heat. It is an absolute breeze to wash up, with that nice coating. No worries about seasoning this cast iron pan. The price compared to a La-te-Da pan 😉 is so much cheaper, but it works just as well. Definitely one of the best things I have bought off Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Barb in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, great quality pan. There were no imperfections in the item I received and then red color perfectly matches the Le Creuset dutch oven I have. The enamel is very easy to clean. The only reason I gave it 4 stars - it's very heavy relative to a Le Creuset but given the price difference well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mball572

customer_reviews.title: Perfection / A Fits All Pot!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Extremely versatile, I've used to bake Chicken in the Oven and each time the chicken comes out golden and moist, I've also used to make Curry Rice on the stove top. The color is perfect for my kitchen. Cleans real easy and cooking is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Like a Dream...
customer_reviews.text: What an eye catcher!...This pan is so fantastic... I bought 2...Beautiful color...Super easy to clean, food comes out beautiful..I love this pan....Nice and heavy, well made...Cooks like a dream....I really loved the idea it came with a lid.....
customer_reviews.author: Kick-N  Chick-N  Kitch-N....

customer_reviews.title: Lodge EC3CC13 Enameled Cast Iron Casserole, 3.6 Quart, White - from the waehouse
customer_reviews.text: This casserole came from the Warehouse with two large chips out of the enamel. Returned this time to the Hub Locker on 4/2/20 and still have not received a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ohl

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why I waited so long!
customer_reviews.text: I've actually been eyeing Le Creuset but just could not bring myself to spend close to $300! So I decided to just try Lodge. It was priced around $45. The first one came with a small chip. I requested an exchange and a replacement was quickly sent out, even before I had a chance to ship out the original! Anyway, I've used it couple of times and it works beautifully! I mainly use it when I'm braising meat. It's also looks great! Honestly I saved $250 so that I can use it towards other kitchen stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Ericamft

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen staple!
customer_reviews.text: This piece accompanies my current Lodge enameled stock pot, which I use frequently for cooking. The lower profile of this casserole dish will enable easier cooking of chicken and vegetables on an everyday basis. It is also lighter and less awkward for cleaning and moving than the large stock pot. Package arrived intact, no damages, chips, and appropriately packaged. Enameled cookware is easy to clean and browns meat beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is well made, beautiful color, easy to clean. I made chicken tikka masala first time and red thai chicken...came out so delicious! Very satisfied about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sym

customer_reviews.title: Great value - great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I was looking at the Le Creuset version for $300 but needed to get my head examined for that. This is as good - as well made and at a fraction of the price a great deal. It shipped nicely - very protected. Very happy with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The moment I saw that box on my steps I ripped it open! I immediately started with a grilled cheese and tomato! The pan is wpnderful; a bit heavy but even distribution of heat! I love all LODGE and don't have the cleaning as I would with plain cast iron! Delightful
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Even bacon sticks. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. Sending it back. It's big and it's pretty. I wanted to like it, but everything stuck despite the fact that I cooked on low medium or medium, and constantly watched it. Even bacon stuck! I like my plain old Red Copper squuare pan, and even a old fashioned Revere Ware skillet worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I just started collecting these enamel coated cast iron cookware pieces from Lodge. Must better value than some of the pricey brands in the kitchen stores. The even heating and heat retention are great in these cast iron products. The ceramic cooking surface is easy to clean, much easier than raw cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love my Cast Iron Casserole Dish
customer_reviews.text: First of, it is very heavy so be careful not to drop it. Cooks food evenly and it has become my favorite go to peace for cooking. FYI - You should keep the black rubber tabs that come with the casserole dish for when you store it after use so that you can place the lid upside down on top of the bottom peace so that it will not chip either peace when not in use. Love the color and the way it cooks my food. Wished I had purchased this many years ago.
customer_reviews.author: SoniaN

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pan for two weeks and use it almost daily. I've cooked spaghetti sauce, fried potatoes, fried chicken, etc. I love it! I'm getting rid of the cast iron skillet I've had 20 yrs. This pan cooks every bit as good, easy to clean and no maintenance. I love this thing so much I bought the matching Dutch Oven.
customer_reviews.author: btchboyer

customer_reviews.title: quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 other Lodge enameled cast iron pots and they function very well. I choose Lodge because of the positive ratings from others, the durability, and the cost. I wanted a casserole dish and this one functional and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Frugalshopper

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PAN
customer_reviews.text: Love the pan. I bought it to replace a le creuset dutch oven I dropped and ruined. I had it for years but not going back at today’s prices. I find this to be more versatile. It’s heavy, but aren’t they all when you get to be 70. Still it’s easy to clean and works great on my glass top stove. I also have a gas stove it works well on.
customer_reviews.author: ursw

customer_reviews.title: Loved the replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back, blue paint was peeling off. Was sent a new one the very next day. Birthday girl Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: June L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot. It stays on top of my stove and I use it all the time. It is very easy to clean, just throw some hot water in it to deglaze and wipe it out with soap and water. Also, it is very good looking and presents food well if you want to put it on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Lytepipe

customer_reviews.title: Love It -- Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Not wanting to pay Le Crueset prices this is a perfect, budget friendly alternative. Lodge product are tried and true. This is no exception. Bonus: the color blue is absolutely beautiful. Buy it... You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: JaneW

customer_reviews.title: In love with ceramic covered cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: I fixed a casserole dish and it distrubed the heat evenly. Clean .up was an breeze. I love cast iron, but dread the cleaning of it not mention the seasoning again. The color blue is lovely, makes for a pretty table.
customer_reviews.author: Elliemae

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Enamelware
customer_reviews.text: Recommend for tomato sauces, or if adding vinegar to stewing meat. Prevents leaching if use. . . versus widespread aluminum cookware. Also energy efficient as heavy and heats very well with electric burner.
customer_reviews.author: Meadow lark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pan!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pan! Have used it for a variety of things, from eggs and sausage to rice pilaf and it goes from stove top to oven perfectly. Far less expensive than the le Crueset but just as functional and lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Detox Poncho

customer_reviews.title: Younger daughter's birthday present
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cast iron dish at our younger daughter's request for her birthday. She is very pleased with the dish and has used it a number of times already. We'll have to consider one for ourselves!
customer_reviews.author: James J. Bjaloncik

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking at the fancy ones at kitchen stores but was too cheap to buy them. This one fits the bill well. It looks good and price was right. I’ve only cooked a few things but heat distribution seems good and clean up much easier than the non coated cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Passed The Frittata Test
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping I could make Frittata in it. I was worried that it would stick and be a disaster but it worked just fine. (I always use oil to help it not stick). Now I can discontinue my using the non stick coated pan! Super easy to clean. I basically just wiped it out.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy garbage
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box - it’s garbage. Now I have to figure out a way to mail this back. Very disappointing. Crap quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Corey

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great to use, easy to clean, fits a ton of food. I never thought of a pan as being beautiful, but this one is. I love the color. The only drawback is this pan is HEAVY. I need both hands to pick it up, and pouring anything is awkward. Maybe if I was 20 years younger it wouldn't be a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, other than the lid screw length
customer_reviews.text: Great “everyday” pan, cleans easily, perfect for one pot recipes just a bit too much for my 12” skillet. 4 stars instead of 5 as the included screw to hold the handle to the lid was much too short - needed to be longer to do the job. $0.44 at the hardware store for a 10/32 1 1/4” screw, and love this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Nb13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cast iron skillet but didn’t want to pay over $100. I’m hooked. Super solid, great quality, cooks evenly on stove and in oven. Perfect size. Will be used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Benefits of cast iron without the maintenance
customer_reviews.text: All of the benefits of cast iron without the maintenance! I did not have issues with sticking, and the small amount of food that did get burned on was very easy to clean off with 3min soak and plastic scrub brush. I LOVE my other basic cast iron, but I am not great at maintaining it as I should, resulting in rust that I later have to get off with salt... not an issue with this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja D.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality... Weighty
customer_reviews.text: Love this, and at 1/6 the cost of the Le Creuset braiser, & made in America! Fantastic quality... May even get a few for gifts for my cooking friends. Made sausage gravy the first day, but look forward to using it for a casserole or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grimberg

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous cookware!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous cookware! I have many Lodge pieces as well as the more expensive competitors. Lodge is the best. I searched in stores for weeks and finally got smart and hopped on Amazon.com. So easy! I bought this one for a bridal gift. She was blown away by the color and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great product by Lodge
customer_reviews.text: This is just an all around workhorse. I have one Le Creuset that I paid over 3x and I would pick Lodge over it hands down. Maintains level heat and easy to clean even when you think "that's going to be baked on for sure". You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pan! Heat distributed evenly! I learned quickly to not turn the heat as high as I would have with other pans. This retains the heat for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Heavy- A Keeper
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen piece will last through several generations and is one lovely piece to be handed down. It is quite heavy and could also be used as a weapon! One can cook or bake in it. It could go from the oven to the fridge as well. This lovely piece cleans nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen

customer_reviews.title: Love these Lodge Enamel Cast Iron Pans
customer_reviews.text: Love these Lodge Enamel Cast Iron Pans, I have the big Dutch oven too and love these pots. Just about the only pots I use now. They are very heavy but work amazing from stove top to oven.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Parker

customer_reviews.title: The price was right.
customer_reviews.text: Love . . . Love . . . Love! This item, its the one I use the most. I bought it for a good price. I saw others for a higher price, which didn't make sense to me When the only difference was the name.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: High quality & Stunning color
customer_reviews.text: This is sooo beautiful. I cooked some chicken with it the very next day! I did notice the pan takes a little longer to heat compared to the thin junk I used to cook with but that’s because of the bottom pan thickness. My chicken was super juicy and done quickly
customer_reviews.author: Visser family

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Lodge Logic has very good quality products. This is my third product I have from them, this casserole skillet is no different. It is made with the best quality; cooks evenly with low to medium heat, can be used in the oven and cleans up easily. I highly recommend this product as anything you can cook in it comes out with great taste, (no metallic/iron taste), and cooked to perfection. Shop Amazon.com for these products, there are so many varieties from Lodge Logic, products that I never seen any where else. Thank you Amazon.com for offering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sukey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: it states food will not stick i have bought 2 pans and both pans food sticks to it really bad will never buy these pans again. BIG MISTAKE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cast Iron
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleasantly surprised with how versatile this dish is. Works well on my electric stovetop and in the oven. From potpies to searing steak to risotto - this pan can do it all and looks great while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ja'anai Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Got damaged
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ad a wedding gift. Received damaged, search, almost like it had been returned and resold. Had to wait several days to get. Returned the item. Color is nice
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Whaley

customer_reviews.title: Right Size for the Job
customer_reviews.text: Fits the large double burner on my Ceramic cooktop range. Perfectly. Releases food fabulously. Stays hot forever. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: R. Friberg

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS VERSATILE PAN!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. Very versatile! Cleans up well. Super speedy delivery. Use it for many different cooking processes!!! This was a simple, quick, and fabulous purchase.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap
customer_reviews.text: not happy with the quality. When I opened the box, the pot had already started losing the outer coating. Very Cheap. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DHV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have le creuset and this one from Lodge which is cheaper. Quality of Lodge is very good and i lovethis for cooking chicken. Very easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pan
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pan, every time I cook with it everything comes out awesome and my family says it’s the best they’ve ever had that I made. It cooks phenomenally
customer_reviews.author: noneed01

customer_reviews.title: Lodge casserole arrived chipped
customer_reviews.text: The Lodge casserole arrived with a chip in the external enamel, about 1/2 by 3/8 inches. I was very disappointed. I obtained a refund instead of requesting a replacement. Given others have had similar experience, I thought "why bother". The packaging seemed sub par which probably contributed to the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Lodge 3.6 Quart Cast Iron Casserole Pan. Red Enamel Cast Iron Casserole Dish with Dual Handles and Lid (Island Spice Red)
product_meta.description: Color:Spice RedThis 3.6 Quart enamel covered casserole is great for cooking, marinating, refrigeration and freezing. The color porcelain enamel on cast iron can be used on gas, electric, ceramic and induction cooktops, as well as in the oven. Not recommended for use on outdoor grills or over open outdoor flames. Not for use in microwaves. Lodge Color Porcelain Enamel on Cast Iron cookware is cast from molten iron in individual sand molds. The porcelain surface eliminates the need to season cast iron. The cast iron vessel has superior heat distribution and retention, evenly heating bottom sidewalls and even the lid. Tightly fitting lid seals in moisture. The excellent heat retention reduces the amount of energy needed for cooking. Two layers of very hard, glossy porcelain enamel are chip resistant and easy to clean. Lid knob is oven safe to 500 degrees Fahrenheit. The black rim on the pot is matte porcelain, not exposed cast iron. Hygienic porcelain enamel is non-reactive with food. Although dishwasher safe, hand washing with warm soapy water is recommended to preserve the cookware's original appearance. 11 3/4" diameter, 2 1/8" deep. Complete item measures 14.4" x 12.55" x 3.4". Island Spice Red. Allow cookware to cool before washing
feature_bullets: Broil, braise, bake or roast up to 500 degrees F
Saute, simmer or fry on any stovetop
The right tool to marinate, refrigerate, cook and serve
Unparalleled in heat retention and even heating
Smooth glass surface won't react to ingredients
Porcelain surface eliminates the need to season
Tightly fitting lid seals in moisture
Two layers of porcelain enamel are chip resistant

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
